#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#include<iomanip>
#define ll long long
using namespace std ;
ll rev(ll a)
{
	ll r = 0 ;
	while(a>0)
	{
		r = (10*r) + a%10 ;
		a = a/10 ;
	}
	return r ;
}
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	ll t , m , n ;
	cin >> t ;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin >> m >> n ;
		cout << rev(rev(m)+rev(n)) << endl ;
	}
}
